column1: Table 2-12:  U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions by Economic Sector and Gas with Electricity-Related Emissions Distributed (MMT CO2 Eq.) and Percent of Total in 2019

column2: Notes: Total emissions presented without LULUCF. Net emissions presented with LULUCF. Emissions from electric power are allocated based on aggregate electricity use in each end-use sector. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
+ Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq. or 0.05 percent.
a Percent of total (gross) emissions excluding emissions from LULUCF for year 2019.
c The LULUCF Sector Net Total is the net sum of all LULUCF CH4 and N2O emissions to the atmosphere plus net carbon stock changes.
